experiences.title: Software Engineer Trainee
experiences.subtitle: Esko
workDescription: Convert Wireframes And Figma To Front-End Components Using React And Javascript.
Contributed Towards Storing, Retrieving, And Analysing Large Volumes Of Data Using Elastic Search.
Built Practical Microservices In Java To Handle The Data Retrieved And Provide Useful Information To Customers.
Collaborated With Project Managers And Stakeholders To Understand Their Requirements And Deliver Software Solutions That Meet Their Needs.
Participated In Code Reviews To Ensure Code Quality, Identify Bugs And Suggest Improvements.
Contributed Towards Clearing Security Vulnerabilities In The Application To Ensure Software Quality
Developed And Implemented Rest API Automated Testing And Designed A Framework In Jenkins To Run Them Periodically.
Involved With Deployment Teams To Create The Ci/Cd Pipeline To Make The Release Process Effortless.
Use Version Control Tools Such As Git To Manage Changes And Ensure Code Integrity.
Participate In Agile Software Development Methodologies Such As Scrum And Involved In Daily Stand-Ups, Sprint Reviews, And Retrospectives.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Trainee Intern
experiences.subtitle: Esko
workDescription: Worked on developing projects in various programming languages such as C++, Java, and JavaScript.
Developed an e-commerce website using React and Java Springboot where customers could view the product, add them to the cart, and checkout. The admin could restock products.
Developed a project in C++ using Dijkstra's algorithm to find the shortest distance between the source and destination countries. Based on the distance, rewards would be given to the customer.
Converted the customer requirements to UML class diagrams for better mapping and relations between classes.
Researched in Confluence about the products and technologies in the company and documented my learning.
Gained insight into the corporate culture by participating in scrum events such as daily stand-ups and grooming.
